title: The One With the Chicken Pox

questions.question: What does Rachel bring to Chandler and Monica at Central Perk?
questions.explanation: Rachel brings a muffin to Chandler and Monica who are sitting on the couch at Central Perk.

questions.question: What is the name of the guy Phoebe went out with who is in the Navy?
questions.explanation: Phoebe tells her friends that Ryan, the guy she went out with who is in the Navy, is coming to New York.

questions.question: What disease does Ben have?
questions.explanation: Ross tells his friends that Ben has the chicken pox.

questions.question: Why does Monica tape oven mitts to Phoebe and Ryan's hands?
questions.explanation: Monica tapes oven mitts to Phoebe and Ryan's hands to prevent them from scratching due to the chicken pox.

questions.question: What is the name of the song Richard is going to sing?
questions.explanation: Richard tells Monica that he is going to sing Jim Crochee's Leroy Brown.

questions.question: What is the name of the character Joey pretends to be at Chandler's office?
questions.explanation: Joey pretends to be a character named Joseph at Chandler's office.

questions.question: What is the reason Richard gives for having to sleep on a specific side of the bed?
options: Because he grew up in California and the ocean would be on the wrong side
Because he is allergic to the other side
Because he has a bad back
Because he likes to face the window
questions.correct_answer: Because he grew up in California and the ocean would be on the wrong side
questions.explanation: Richard tells Monica that he has to sleep on the west side of the bed because he grew up in California and otherwise the ocean would be on the wrong side.

questions.question: What does Ryan do when he says goodbye to Phoebe at the end of the episode?
questions.explanation: Ryan kisses Phoebe goodbye at the end of the episode.

questions.question: What does Ross wear at the end of the episode to impress Rachel?
questions.explanation: Ross wears a uniform at the end of the episode to impress Rachel.

questions.question: What is the name of the park where Phoebe met Ryan?
questions.explanation: Phoebe met Ryan when she was playing guitar in Washington Square Park.

questions.question: Why does Phoebe start scratching herself despite having oven mitts on her hands?
options: Because she is allergic to the oven mitts
Because she has an itch she can't resist
Because she wants to make Ryan laugh
questions.correct_answer: Because she has an itch she can't resist
questions.explanation: Phoebe starts scratching herself despite having oven mitts on her hands because she has an itch she can't resist.

questions.question: What does Joey say about his character Joseph's kids?
options: That they go to the same school as Jeannie's kids
questions.correct_answer: That they go to the same school as Jeannie's kids
questions.explanation: Joey tells Chandler that his character Joseph's kids go to the same school as Jeannie's kids.

questions.question: What does Chandler threaten to do to Joey at the end of the episode?
questions.explanation: Chandler threatens to push Joey out the door at the end of the episode.

questions.question: What is the name of the company where Chandler works?
questions.explanation: Chandler tells Joey about an opening in Fleischman's group.

questions.question: Why does Monica remake the bed?
options: Because she likes to make the bed
Because the tag should be at the bottom right corner
Because the head of the bed is where the sun would be
questions.correct_answer: Because the tag should be at the bottom right corner
questions.explanation: Monica remakes the bed because the tag shouldn't be at the top left corner, it should be at the bottom right corner.

questions.question: What does Phoebe do to Ryan when they are playing Monopoly?
questions.explanation: Phoebe scratches Ryan when they are playing Monopoly.

questions.question: What does Ryan pull out with his teeth?
questions.explanation: Ryan pulls out a cork with his teeth.

questions.question: What does Ross tell Rachel he will do for her?
options: He will buy her a gift
He will take her out for dinner
He will make some calls to get her a uniform
He will give her a massage
questions.correct_answer: He will make some calls to get her a uniform
questions.explanation: Ross tells Rachel that he will make some calls to get her a uniform like the one Ryan was wearing.

questions.question: What does Monica tell Richard she will do to his clocks?
options: She will set them to her time
She will set them to his time
questions.correct_answer: She will set them to her time
questions.explanation: Monica tells Richard that she will set his clocks to her time.

questions.question: What does Joey say about his character Joseph's wife?
questions.explanation: Joey tells Chandler that his character Joseph's wife, Karen, is hot.

questions.question: What does Chandler pretend to do when Joey wakes him up?
questions.explanation: Chandler pretends to be writing when Joey wakes him up.

questions.question: What does Phoebe use to scratch herself when she is playing Monopoly with Ryan?
questions.explanation: Phoebe uses the houses to scratch herself when she is playing Monopoly with Ryan.

questions.question: What does Ross carry Rachel out of Central Perk with at the end of the episode?
questions.explanation: Ross carries Rachel out of Central Perk in his arms at the end of the episode.

questions.question: What does Monica do to the coffee cup that Chandler used?
questions.explanation: Monica licks the rim of the coffee cup that Chandler used.

questions.question: What does Ryan say he would do if he could go back in time?
options: He would build a time machine
He would rub his face on Jimmy Hauser's face
He would give Phoebe a gift
He would go on a vacation
questions.correct_answer: He would rub his face on Jimmy Hauser's face
questions.explanation: Ryan says that if he could go back in time, he would rub his face on Jimmy Hauser's face to get the chicken pox.

questions.question: What does Chandler say about Joseph's wife, Karen?
options: That he is going to have an affair with her
questions.correct_answer: That he is going to have an affair with her
questions.explanation: Chandler jokingly says that he is going to have an affair with Joseph's wife, Karen.

questions.question: What does Phoebe say is ironic about her having the chicken pox?
questions.explanation: Phoebe says that it is ironic that she has the chicken pox because she is a vegetarian.

questions.question: What does Richard say about Monica's obsessive behavior?
questions.explanation: Richard says that Monica's obsessive behavior is cute.

questions.question: What does Joey say about his character Joseph's kids, Ashley and Brittany?
options: That Ashley copies everything Brittany does
questions.correct_answer: That Ashley copies everything Brittany does
questions.explanation: Joey says that his character Joseph's kids, Ashley and Brittany, have a dynamic where Ashley copies everything Brittany does.
